item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Aug 2024
item.description:
1. MlFront - A Java-like package system for OCaml
  2. Rpmfile library v0.3.0 with new Eio-based reader
  3. GitHub - meta-introspector/ocaml-libppx-import-yojson-introspector: Using libppx, ppx_import, reflect over ast using
  4. Dune Developer Preview Updates
  5. Ppxlib dev meetings
  6. Pragmatic Category Theory: Part 2 published!
  7. Dune dev meeting on 2024-08-21, 10am CEST
  8. Other OCaml News
